scripts.postinstall: cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install && cd .. && npm run-script compile
scripts.compile: npm run-script compile:client && npm run-script compile:server
scripts.compile:server: cd server && npm run installServer && cd .. && tsc -p server/tsconfig.json
scripts.watch:server: cd server && npm run installServer && cd .. && tsc -w -p server/tsconfig.json
scripts.distclean: npm run-script distclean:server && npm run-script distclean:client && rm -fr node_modules
